column5: Ask about discounts for 6 weeks or longer. - Two bedrooms (a double and a twin )  - A Jack and Jill bathroom (one bathroom with two separate sinks) - A media room (with tv, a couch, and a desk). Upstairs includes refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker!  You will also have full use of the kitchen. If you request an extra bedroom, an additional charge mayoccur.
